title: A treatise concerning the right use of the Fathers, in the decision of the controversies that are this day in religion written in French by John Daille ...
author: Daillé, Jean, 1594-1670.
publisher: Printed for John Martin, and are to be sold by Robert Boulter ...,
notes: Translation of Traité de l'employ des saints Pères pour le jugement des différences qui sont aujourd'hui en la religion.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
